message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product that I believe will be of great interest to you. While I can't disclose the exact details of the product just yet, I can assure you that its worth is no less than $15000. I'm confident that you'll find its value to be even higher. I'm willing to let it go for $18000, but I'm open to negotiation.  Let me know what you think!
